languages.text: {n}Раздается звучный щелчок, и вашу руку раздирает жуткая боль. Удивительно, но все ваши пальцы все еще на месте — Глейто не удостоил вас даже настоящего укуса, лишь оставил предупреждение. Но если вы не получите перевязку в течение нескольких минут, то и его хватит, чтобы истечь кровью.{/n}

{n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Раздается звучный щелчок, и вашу руку раздирает жуткая боль. Удивительно, но все ваши пальцы все еще на месте — Глейто не удостоил вас даже настоящего укуса, лишь оставил предупреждение. Но если вы не получите перевязку в течение нескольких минут, то и его хватит, чтобы истечь кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

{n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

{n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

{n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

{n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst ein lautes Schnappen und ein heftiger Schmerz durchzuckt deine Hand. Überraschenderweise hast du noch alle Finger ... Glaito hat dich nicht einmal richtig gebissen. Er wollte dich nur warnen. Aber wenn die Wunde nicht in den nächsten Minuten versorgt wird, wirst du verbluten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst ein lautes Schnappen und ein heftiger Schmerz durchzuckt deine Hand. Überraschenderweise hast du noch alle Finger ... Glaito hat dich nicht einmal richtig gebissen. Er wollte dich nur warnen. Aber wenn die Wunde nicht in den nächsten Minuten versorgt wird, wirst du verbluten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un claquement sec et soudain, une douleur terrible assaille votre main. Étonnamment, tous vos doigts sont encore là : Glaito n'a même pas daigné vous infliger une véritable morsure, ce n'était qu'un simple avertissement. Cependant, si la blessure n'est pas pansée rapidement, l'hémorragie pourrait vous être fatale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un claquement sec et soudain, une douleur terrible assaille votre main. Étonnamment, tous vos doigts sont encore là : Glaito n'a même pas daigné vous infliger une véritable morsure, ce n'était qu'un simple avertissement. Cependant, si la blessure n'est pas pansée rapidement, l'hémorragie pourrait vous être fatale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}折れる音がはっきりと響き、あなたの手に激痛が走った。驚いたことに、指はすべて無事についていた。グライトは本気で噛んだわけではなく、ただの警告にとどめたのだ。しかし、もしこの傷を数分以内に包帯で処置しなければ、出血多量で命を落とすことになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}折れる音がはっきりと響き、あなたの手に激痛が走った。驚いたことに、指はすべて無事についていた。グライトは本気で噛んだわけではなく、ただの警告にとどめたのだ。しかし、もしこの傷を数分以内に包帯で処置しなければ、出血多量で命を落とすことになる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes un crujido y sientes un dolor espantoso en la mano. Sorprendentemente, todavía tienes todos los dedos. Glaito ni siquiera te ha dedicado un mordisco de verdad, solo una advertencia. Eso sí, si no te vendas la herida en unos minutos, terminarás por desangrarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un crujido y sientes un dolor espantoso en la mano. Sorprendentemente, todavía tienes todos los dedos. Glaito ni siquiera te ha dedicado un mordisco de verdad, solo una advertencia. Eso sí, si no te vendas la herida en unos minutos, terminarás por desangrarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}随后，你听到“啪”地一声，一阵剧痛从你的手上传来。令你惊讶的是，你的手指居然还在。格雷托甚至根本没有动真格咬你，仅仅是警告你一下而已。不过，如果不赶紧包扎伤口的话，你恐怕很快就会失血过多而死。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，你听到“啪”地一声，一阵剧痛从你的手上传来。令你惊讶的是，你的手指居然还在。格雷托甚至根本没有动真格咬你，仅仅是警告你一下而已。不过，如果不赶紧包扎伤口的话，你恐怕很快就会失血过多而死。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önce bir ısırık sesi duyuyor, ardından elinde korkunç bir acı hissediyorsun. Şaşırtıcı şekilde tüm parmakların yerli yerinde. Glaito, seni sertçe ısırmak yerine ilk raddede uyarmakla yetiniyor. Yine de yaran birkaç dakika içerisinde sarılmazsa kan kaybından ölebilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible snap, and terrible pain rips through your hand. Surprisingly, all your fingers are still in place — Glaito didn't even honour you with a real bite, just a warning. But if the wound is not bandaged in the next few minutes, you will bleed out.{/n}
